page.title: 10STORNOWAY SOUTH - HARBOUR
page.content: Apart from fishing boats, cargo vessels dock with cement, timber and building supplies. Survey vessels do research in the Atlantic Ocean to see where rocks are so that other ships can avoid the rocks, they also chart the ocean. Fishery research vessels search for shoals of fish then report back to say whats happening to the fish. There are{F.P.V., (fishery {protection vessels)}to patrol the water to see that too much fish is'nt caught, the F.P.V.s' that dock in Stornoway are - the {JURA, SUILESGEIR, {VALIANT}and the{MOIDART.}There are pleasure craft including yachts, speed boats, rowing boats and canoes. Stornoway has only a small yacht population compared to other ports. The navy use Stornoway as a last port before Amarica. The{SULIVEN,}is the local car ferry.
